summary: Completed comprehensive testing of authentication and routing flows. Found critical issues with redirect logic for authenticated users accessing login/signup pages and root path.

critical_bugs.issue: Authenticated users (guest mode) can still access login page - redirect logic not working
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Should redirect to dashboard when authenticated user tries to access /login
critical_bugs.current_behavior: Login page loads normally even when user is authenticated

critical_bugs.issue: Authenticated users (guest mode) can still access signup page - redirect logic not working
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Should redirect to dashboard when authenticated user tries to access /signup
critical_bugs.current_behavior: SignUp page loads normally even when user is authenticated

critical_bugs.issue: Authenticated users (guest mode) are not redirected from root path to dashboard
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Should redirect to dashboard when authenticated user accesses /
critical_bugs.current_behavior: Home page loads normally even when user is authenticated

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks all interactions and cannot be dismissed
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents users from clicking navigation elements and buttons

integration_issues.issue: Guest user data not persisting in localStorage after login
integration_issues.details: localStorage shows 'no_guest_data' even after successful guest login

passed_tests: Root path shows Home page for unauthenticated users
Login page loads correctly with all form elements
SignUp page loads correctly with all form elements
Guest mode login works and redirects to Dashboard
Dashboard loads correctly for guest users with proper UI elements
Dashboard access control works (unauthenticated users redirected to login)
Logout functionality works and redirects to home
Basic page navigation structure is functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical redirect logic issues in Home.tsx, Login.tsx, and SignUp.tsx. The useEffect hooks for redirecting authenticated users are not working properly. Also fix the WelcomeTour modal overlay that blocks user interactions. Investigate why guest user data is not persisting in localStorage.
